overview: We've reached our tenth birthday and boy, are we proud! Ten volumes of the youngest pussies allowed by law, all spread, wet and willing, wide open and waiting, hairy, shaved, pink and brown and glistening and ripe, and just waiting for you to stroke yourself over each and every one. We've covered the spectrum of forbidden love for you aging strokers, and we're sure you're gonna love every disgusting minute.
title: Sweet Lil' 18 10
